titleStmt.title: A Faithful account of a great engagement which happened on Good-Friday the 18th instant before the city of Dublin the late King James being himself in person at the head of his troops : with a relation of the taking his admiral routing his forces and other particulars.

notesStmt.note: "Licensed April 25, 1690. James Fraser. Entred according to order."
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
